definition: global unique identifier for the observation
name of the datasource
verbatim date
day of the year.  Must be between 1 and 366
year of the observation
latitude with precision up to 6 decimal places
longitude with precision up to 6 decimal places
coordinate uncertainty in meters
family of the organism
scientific name of the observed organism
taxonomic rank of the scientific name
basis of record of oberserved organism.  See darwin core reference for values
individual ID of the observed organism
occurrence ID of the observed organism
Verbatim description of the trait
Trait tested.  Currently "flower" or "fruit"
Globally Unique Identifier of the image
URL for the image
Certainy of machine observation (Equivocal or Unequivocal)
URI of the model
Error messages from processing
Pipe delimited list of mapped traits
